thread.title: Superb Paris hotel
thread.title_full: Superb Paris hotel - Review of Jack's Hotel, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: Bill401
title: Superb Paris hotel
text:
This hotel has a great location between two metro stops: Nationale (line 6) and Place d'Italie (multiple lines- 6, 5, etc.). It is in a quiet side street, yet an easy walk to restaurants, a taxi queue, and shops. The staff is friendly and welcoming. Rooms are accessible by elevator, clean, and well-appointed for a reasonable priced hotel. The continental breakfast is a good value, with fresh food, good seating, and variety of choices. I felt secure and safe staying here and plan to return on future visits.
Room Tip: As far as I can tell, every room is good for solo travelers. See more room tips
